attributes.title: 🧚‍♂️✨garbage✨🧚‍♂️
attributes.review: this app tracked me everywhere so i had to change my name and address and i was also greeted by a cheeto when i opened it which scared me. although i would love to support our ✨cheeto✨ president, this is not the way.

attributes.title: Trump is terrible
attributes.review: this app is terrible because trump needs to leave the office

attributes.title: ✨ d i s g u s t i n g ✨
attributes.review: Ok so, right when i opened the app a saw an oompaloompa. Im scared now. This app is scary. And it said make America great again. Scary.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Crashed 4 times so I just got rid of it

attributes.title: Worst app.
attributes.review: This app deadass hacked all my social media and bank, I would like to sue them for their actions.

attributes.title: My mom
attributes.review: This app is horrible my mom opens it and she litterly passed out and isn’t waking up screw u trump

attributes.title: hope u get deleted 🥰
attributes.review: not only did the app take 69 hours to download, but once i was finally able to open it up, it just played what does the fox say on repeat.

attributes.title: Don’t Download
attributes.review: I got this app to see if I can get some good facts, however I was met with a lying, orange face.😞🤡
I got the app to support my✨toxic, misogynistic, racist joke of a president✨and I wasn’t all that surprised when I hated the app.

attributes.title: absolute trash
attributes.review: i was uninformed about the coming election so i downloaded donald trumps app. i couldn’t find any information... will not be voting for someone who can’t even make an app yet alone run the country
